Title: Relates to the availability and use of opioid antagonists on trains
Summary: Requires the availability and permits the use of opioid antagonists on trains.
LawCode: Amd §3309, Pub Health L; amd §77-a, Rail L; amd §§1266-a & 1266-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, the railroad law and the public authorities law, in relation to the use and availability of opioid antagonists in train stations and on trains operated by public transit authorities
